EmailTemplate.subject: Yearbook 2013/14
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
We will soon be releasing the BSG Yearbook 2013/14.
Every family will receive a free digital copy on CD and we can announce that this will also include a special 18-track album of Secondary music!
The music is a mixture of singing and instrumentals covering some of the most popular performances of the year, including piano compositions, ensembles and vocals.
Enjoy!
Stuart Geraghty Publications Editor & Librarian
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
____________________________________________________________
A Nord Anglia Education School - University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International Schools In Asia (FOBISIA)- Member of the Council of British International Schools (COBIS) - Member of the Council of International Schools (CIS) - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
